instructions.content: Implement event-driven architecture with proper event sourcing, CQRS patterns, and event streaming. Ensure event ordering, deduplication, and proper error handling in event processing.
Implement service mesh for microservices communication with traffic management, security policies, and observability. Use tools like Istio, Linkerd, or Consul Connect.
Implement robust data integration with ETL/ELT pipelines, data validation, and error handling. Ensure data consistency across systems and implement proper data lineage tracking.
Integrate with legacy systems using appropriate patterns like Anti-Corruption Layer, Strangler Fig, or Event Interception. Implement gradual modernization strategies.
